name: places/ChIJlzp0AzdZwokRfQYnJKsE_C8

displayName.text: Prohealth and Fitness PT OT PLLC

adrFormatAddress: 1041 3rd Ave #204, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Both Oscar and Christian were great. Oscar really took his time on my hip and thoroughly explained each exercise and their benefit. You could tell he cares about his patients. Both he and Christian were personable, friendly. My sessions were always prompt too. It was a great experience! Thank you Oscar!

text.text: Both Oscar and Christian were great. Oscar really took his time on my hip and thoroughly explained each exercise and their benefit. You could tell he cares about his patients. Both he and Christian were personable, friendly. My sessions were always prompt too. It was a great experience! Thank you Oscar!

originalText.text: I went to Oscar for a pretty sever case of sciatica and within 6 weeks of receiving physical therapy from him I feel like a new person! He was very thorough and insightful with his treatment plan. He never pushed me beyond my limits, but always made sure I got the most out of my sessions. Oscar and the rest of the office staff are extremely professional and always looks out for what is best for the patient. They are second to none!

originalText.text: Both Oscar and Christian are compassionate, caring, understanding, knowledgeable and empathetic therapists. They hear what you have to say and work with you on an action plan to make you more at ease.  Prohealth and Fitness is the best place to go for any physical pain or discomfort you might have. You will leave happy and pain free.

originalText.text: This place is wonderful everyone is always so nice and helpful! Oscar is always professional. He truly cares about his patients. He always makes sure to address our concerns and makes sure we are comfortable and feeling no pain. . His soft spoken manner makes the experience even better!!!

text.text: This place is wonderful everyone is always so nice and helpful! Oscar is always professional. He truly cares about his patients. He always makes sure to address our concerns and makes sure we are comfortable and feeling no pain. . His soft spoken manner makes the experience even better!!!

originalText.text: I found this place by chance through my insurance portal, and I'm glad I did. It's a smaller office set-up, so it's never overly crowded with lots of people doing different activities, which I like. Oscar does a great job with the PT. He makes the time spent there pleasant, and he pushes you just the right amount. I had an injured shoulder and made great progress with it in only a month, regaining most of the range of movement that I had lost. Jessica and Christian are also great and do a wonderful job making sure the whole operation runs smoothly. I would definitely recommend this spot for anyone in need of physical therapy.
